CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode ), "None", IF(CONTAINS(":AL:CB::CM::CO:EN:IG:IP:LU:MK:NR:PE:RM:SG:SS:WD", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "East Anglia", IF(CONTAINS("CV:DE:DY:LE:NG:NN:ST:WS:WV", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "Midlands", IF(CONTAINS("BD:DH:DL:DN:HD:HG:HU:HX:LN:LS:NE:SR:TS:WF:YO", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "North East", IF(CONTAINS("BB:BL:CA:CW:FY:LA:OL:PR:SK:TF:WA:WN:CH", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "North West", IF(CONTAINS("EC:NW:SE:SW:WC", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "London", IF(CONTAINS("GU:HA:HP:OX:PO:RG:SL:SN:SO:SP:UB", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "South Central", IF(CONTAINS("BN:BR:CR:CT:DA:KT:ME:RH:SM:TN:TW:BA", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "South East", IF(CONTAINS("BH:BS:DT:EX:GL:HR:PL:TA:TQ:TR:WR", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "South West", IF(CONTAINS("CF:LD:LL:NP:SY:SA", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "Wales", IF(CONTAINS("BT", left(BillingPostalCode, 2)), "Northern Ireland", IF(CONTAINS("AB:DD:DG:EH:FK:HS:IV:KA:KW:KY:ML:PA:PH:TD:ZE", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "Scotland", IF(CONTAINS("GY:JE:IM", left(BillingPostalCode ,2)), "Islands", IF(CONTAINS("B", left(BillingPostalCode ,1)), "Midlands", IF(CONTAINS("S", left(BillingPostalCode ,1)), "North East", IF(CONTAINS("M:L", left(BillingPostalCode ,1)), "North West", IF(CONTAINS("E:N:W", left(BillingPostalCode ,1)), "London", IF(CONTAINS("G", left(BillingPostalCode ,1)), "Scotland", "Other"))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: UK region by postcode
